channel.title: Formulas :: Better BibTeX for Zotero
channel.description: Note: a number of functions below talk about the author’s lastname; you can read that as “when available”. If you have the name as a single-field name (for entities like International Business Machines or Aristoteles), Zotero doesn’t have a last name, and the full single-field name is taken instead. Functions auth(n: number = 0, m: number = 1, creator: ('author' | 'editor' | 'translator' | 'collaborator' | '*') = '*', initials: boolean = false)The first n (default: all) characters of the mth (default: first) author's last name.
